headline: HART CALIBRATION BATH
specstable:
Manufacturer Hart Scientific
Model 7030
Description Precision Calibration Bath
Other Information Temperature range: -30 to 150°C
Temperature setability: ±0.002°C
Temperature resetability: ±0.002°C
Accuracy: ±1°C
Typical short and long term stability: ±0.01°C
Tank capacity: 6 liters
Test well: 2.6" Dia. x 11.3" Deep with 1/4" mecury trap on bottom
Single stage air cooled compressor
Refrigerant R507
Power Requirements 115 V 17.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Year of Manufacture 1994
Condition Very Good
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Depth 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Height 39.000 in (99.1 cm)
Weight 120 lb (54 kg)
